hot dang. lots new. lots still broken.

Further tweaks to data gathering.
better searching and release date handling.
mostly working basic draft.
first commit.

Add None to lang1 prefs.
Change lang1 default pref to None.
add search for imdbid when we dont get a hash match. don't duplicate a search if lang1 and lang2 prefs are the same.

1. updated to use new plexapp.api.opensubtitles.org API url.
2. updated to log user in when accessing the opensubtitles API.
3. refactored common code.
working for tv shows now, pending ungzip unfucking. needs more testing!
first step towards adding TV show support. untested--just pushing to get it to a test machine.
remove .txt from subtitle extensions.
fix thai language pref
fixup pref language localizations
filter out subtypes we dont recognize. grab only the top downloaded sub for each language we get back.
move to three-letter prefs and localization to map to opensubtitles req. tweak everything to work.
remove some log crapola
actually start grabbing subs from the site!

Reduce number of artists searched.
Enable Album summary.
Use lowercased artist in artist search.
Bonus for exact same number of tracks on an album (helps disambiguate).
Try grabbing the "mega" sized cover art.
Don't bother grabbing the "official" track playlist.
start using the plex proxy for last.fm! thanks Darrin!

major reworking.
1. uses levdistance to reduce chance of a bogus artist match
2. uses album names to confirm/disambiguate an artist match
3. uses track names to confirm/disambiguate an album match
4. does not replace the track names/index
5. fixes bugs with last.fm album ids/url encoding [could be more stuff that is getting urlencoded funky]
remove some logging. no-op the artist's album check for now.

short circuiting for [unknown artist/album] and Various Artists.
start of album scoring for Artists--to confirm artist selection.
new function for grabbing album titles for an artistID.
fix for enabling various artist album lookups.
make sure the thumb is not empty before trying to pull it.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:plexinc-agents/LastFM.bundle into superpea-master

Revert "If we don't find an album match on last.fm, add a null match so that the rest of the metadata agents get called. Whitespace cleanup."

This reverts commit 4f8ea8667a7ed67ca86b585bcf28d5c8053862d0.
If we don't find an album match on last.fm, add a null match so that the rest of the metadata agents get called. Whitespace cleanup.
fix comment.
working for tv shows now, pending ungzip unfucking. needs more testing!
first step towards adding TV show support. untested--just pushing to get it to a test machine.

Check to see if we have only one video file in a dir, if so add all the subs we find (else, only add ones where the fileroots match).
fix bug in poster name for mp4 files (which meant posters were being removed when validation occurred). I suck.

Add the new codec param for subs (txt and microdvd).
Validate other .txt formats.

validate album art.

add checking for .sub file when we find a .idx file
NEW: support for global subtitle folder. ~/AS/L/PMS/Subtitles

NEW: Artist search with null result

oops. indentardification.
add ogg art grabbing. not sure anyone ever uses this.

phew! posters.validate_keys for albums art! working!
work on local art shtuff for albums.

skipping tv show art gathering for now.

fix for multiple movies in a single dir bug.

commit_list.message: Add web to source_dict and move r5 into DVD.
Turn off PEDANTIC in Mutagen ID3 reader to avoid raising unavoidable errors.
Add wma tag reading. Fix return value when unable to read tags in some cases, which would have borked adding a file.
minor tweaks to avoid not adding files over dumb/minor issues. a few simple big fixes.
Fix missing "year" hint(s)
be safer about removing track numbers from titles.
don't assign Various Artists to an album if there is an artist name that represents 90+% of the tracks on the album. (deals with one or two songs on an album that have a different artist name).
fix order for stripping/encoding to utf-8. should be much safer.
ignore the iTunes compilation flag.
favor euc_kr over cp949
add wtv extension for windows media center tv recordings.
fix generic mutagen "album artist" tag name (it's not performer, like in easyID3, it is albumartist)
cleanup to optimize for less tag reading. general code simplification.
use the section's language setting to help with decoding the tags.

simplify code.
try mutagen for mp3 first.
fix idv1 tag preference when the album or artist idv2 tags are empty.
Merge branch 'master' of github.com:plexinc-plugins/Scanners.bundle into superpea-master

A variety of Various Artists mods.
1. use a list of possible various artist variations.
2. limit the compilation flag -> various artist mapping to only when the album_artist is empty.
3. fixed a bug where we might try to parse a multiple ' - ' filename or foldername...this can be improved, once i understand the conventions for ' - ''s in filenames/foldernames. :)
4. when we look at a folder, group the tracks into similar album names before seeing if the artists differ.
5. make sure the AlbumArtist is blank before we change it using this algorithm to switch it to Various Artists.
6. fixed a bug where we returned a blank album_artist if the album_artist and artist were the same. seemed to screw up later heuristics.
fix bogus track number fallback grabbing bug.
if we have an unknown artist or album, see if we can't parse the parent dir for either

add 'cpil' (itunes compilation flag) to easymp4.py...not sure why that list is so limited.

check mp4 files for compilation flag.
Convert to lowercase before comparing album/artists for VA determination.

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:plexinc-plugins/Scanners.bundle into superpea-master

Conflicts:
	Contents/Resources/Music/Plex Music Scanner.py
make sure album_artist is not None before looking at it!
switch to using album_artist to pass in the Various Artist label.
if the album artist is various artists, use that for the artist.
remove some bogus prints and commented code.
add all new various artist logic to see if we are looking at the same album name with different artists.
Add (itunes) compilation tag extraction and set the artist to Various Artists if it is true.
extended stacking from 1-4, a-d to 1-9, a-n

FIX: issue when reading tags.
FIX: make sure we don't duplicate album+artist+track for real.

Fix: Deal with duplicate track numbers from tags.
Fix: the current id3 tag lib is awful, so working around it more and more.
Fix: parse track number before splitting artist/title.

New: Unknown Artist.
New: Try to grab track numbers from title if track numbers is empty.
New: if title is empty, grab the filename.
New: if artist is unknown use the a '-' to split artist/track from filename
Fix: fake out track numbers safely, if they are blank (starting at 100)
Fixed tag['performer'] issue. Minor logging changes.

No more album short circuiting shtuff. Add anything we can!
Mutagen fallback when the id3 tag libs fail.
Allow adding folders with 50 or more files.
Switch to using mutagen for mp4/m4a/m4b files.
Fix missing album tag to be 'Unknown' instead of '-'. Some other minor tweaks.
Fixed issues with adding files with incomplete tags and a nasty bug in there, too.
Add support for .ogg files.
Fix unicode encoding issue. Phew!
Added mutagen libs. Added scanning for FLAC.
initialize vars before testing them!
add tries/excepts to mp4 tag gathering.
added mp4file for reading mp4 tags (thanks James!)--for real this time.
added mp4file for reading mp4 tags (thanks James!). Added m4v tag reading.

fixed issue where both the exact tvdb match and the tvrage search would not pass any search query string in, since we skipped setting the mediaShowYear variable because it got lumped into the "skipping search engine" block...simple fix, possibly large change in results.
minor fix to ensure we dont reduce the tvdb exact match score.
tweak to search tvdb and ignore stuff, like language, in parenthesis.
fix to strip extra space after twiddling with cleaning up the show name. fixes Sherlock search and others.
